sentences.english: Objective To research the clinical effect of microwave thermocoagulation in endonasal sinus surgery.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究微波热凝在鼻窦内窥镜术中的临床作用。

sentences.english: As a result, childhood migraines are often dismissed as sinus headaches.
sentences.chinese: 因此，小孩的偏头痛往往被诊断为鼻窦炎疼痛。

sentences.english: That, he says, will be the next big advance in sinus treatment.
sentences.chinese: 他说，这将会是未来治疗鼻窦炎的巨大的进步。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the influence of atomizing inhalation on post operative irrigation of ESS.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨内窥镜鼻窦手术术后雾化吸入对疗效的影响。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the CT diagnostic value and CT findings of fungal sinusitis .
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨霉菌性鼻窦炎CT特征性表现及诊断价值。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the representation and value of CT examination of mycosis of sinus.
sentences.chinese: 探讨霉菌性鼻窦炎的CT表现和价值。

sentences.english: Sufferred from very serious nose sinusitis nose to you can greaten ceaselessly ?
sentences.chinese: 患了很严重的鼻窦炎鼻子就会不断变大吗？

sentences.english: I still suffer from catarrh and sinus problems.
sentences.chinese: 我仍然患有黏膜炎和鼻窦炎。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the role of adenoidectomy in the treatment of pediatric chronic rhinosinusitis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨腺样体切除术对儿童慢性鼻窦炎转归的影响。

sentences.english: This paper described a technique, "Transnasal endoscopicsphenoid sinus surgery ", that had been used for 28 patients.
sentences.chinese: 应用内窥镜鼻窦外科技术施行蝶窦区域的手术28例。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate CT scanning in the diagnosis of nasal and paranasal melanoma.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨鼻腔及鼻窦恶性黑色素瘤的CT诊断价值。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the effect of microwave for adenoidectomy on chronic rhinosinusitis in children.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨微波切除腺样体治疗儿童慢性鼻窦炎的疗效。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate CT features and diagnostic value of fungus infection of paranasal sinuses.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨真菌性鼻窦炎的CT特征性表现及诊断价值。

sentences.english: Upside down, water filling her sinuses, it was difficult to remember how to escape.
sentences.chinese: 她头朝下，水流进了鼻窦，这时候很难想起如何逃生。

sentences.english: Computed tomography revealed a huge sinonasal tumor with orbital wall destruction.
sentences.chinese: 电脑断层摄影发现一巨大鼻窦肿瘤伴随眼窝侵犯。

sentences.english: I highly recommend Congest Away for sinus headache and congestion.
sentences.chinese: 极力推荐给那些鼻窦阻塞和头痛的人使用。

definition: Eustachian tube (linking pharynx 咽 to tympanic cavity 鼓室 of middle ear)/auditory tube
